attributes.action: Abolish the London Assembly & replace it with a Minister for London.
attributes.additional_details:
London is our capital city, a world city, & generates a large percentage of the UK’s income. But the current administration appears to act in it’s own interests before that of London. It spends vast amounts on PR & is intent on pushing radical policies rather than what benefits Londoners, whilst presiding over policies that damage the city, such as raising the congestion change & bringing TFL to the point of requiring numerous government bailouts. 

The UK does not want its capital’s monuments & statues removed nor its street names changed. We need an individual in charge that values London, its history, & will promote this great city.
attributes.background: Abolish the London Assembly & replace it with a Minister for London appointed by the Prime Minister. Consideration should also be given to returning London’s boundaries to their pre 1963 positions & current outer London boroughs being returned to their respective counties.

rejection.details:
Decisions about changes to the devolution settlement are a matter for the people of London.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

Hold a referendum in London on removing the role of Mayor of London: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334242

We could accept a petition calling for a referendum on ending devolution for London, and appointing a Minister for London, if that is what you want to happen.
